messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Martin Lewis
messages.content:
For a stronger economy
For a fairer society
For wider opportunity for everyone

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Raising the Income Tax threshold for 25 million people, saving them £800 each and lifting 3 million out of tax altogether.

issues.economy: Raising the Income Tax threshold for 25 million people, saving them £800 each and lifting 3 million out of tax altogether.

leaflet.personalStatement:
I have lived in Staffordshire most of my life, going to school in Stafford. I lived in Swynnerton in the 1990s before moving to Clayton in Newcastle under Lyme, on the edge of Stone constituency, where I now live. I was a civil servant for 37 years before retiring a few years ago.

I know some people now disagree, but I think Lib Dems were right to go into a coalition. For five years we have tried hard to keep our coalition partners on the straight and narrow. We have been able to implement several of our key policies.
